content.description:
Mathematical Meditation climbs a solid face via awkward movement over a poor landing.

Sit start with hands matched on the large, sloping shelf. From there, place a heel, crank up to a left hand edge, crank some more, move the left hand to a pinch-edge, follow with the right hand to the lip, and finish up the remaining jugs up top.
content.protection: At least a pair of pads. The landing has a bad rock in the fall zone. It pads well though.
content.location: It climbs the center of Sybarite's north face.

content.description:
Dick Duck traverses perfect rock on slopers and edges over an okay landing.

Sit start with hand matched on the sloping shelf. From there, place a heel, position the hands, stick a right hand edge out to the right, crank up with the left hand to to a edge, match with the right, move with the right up to the lip, match, reach a right hand sidepull, follow with the left to a pocket, gain the arete with the right, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads should work fine. The landing is good, but there is a bad rock behind the majority of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the northeast face of Sybarite.
